definition: to slaughter livestock/to govern or rule/to cheat customers/imperial official in dynastic China
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: Ideally, people culling and disposing of birds should have protective equipment.
sentences.chinese: 宰杀和处理禽类的人应该配备保护装置。

sentences.english: The final part of the test involves the chef eating the pieces of fugu that he has cut.
sentences.chinese: 测试的最后一部分包括他自己宰杀的河豚。

sentences.english: His present work culls from faces and sentiments.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸和情绪，从当前工作宰杀。

sentences.english: The sheep was butchered by a man with a sharp knife .
sentences.chinese: 那只羊被一个人用锋利的刀宰杀了。

sentences.english: All the pigs are slaughtered at about 90 kg liveweight.
sentences.chinese: 所有的猪在活重达90公斤左右时宰杀。

sentences.english: Six people died in that outbreak and all chickens in the territory were culled .
sentences.chinese: 当时，造成了6人死亡，香港所有的活鸡因此被宰杀。

sentences.english: Unlike standard bullfights, the bulls are not killed in these events.
sentences.chinese: 与标准斗牛不同，这些牛在比赛中不被宰杀。

sentences.english: The goats are being fattened up for slaughter.
sentences.chinese: 那些羊正被喂得肥肥的准备宰杀。

sentences.english: It was no good killing them on the ranges.
sentences.chinese: 在农场上宰杀牛是不明智的。

sentences.english: We're fattening the livestock up for slaughter.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在催肥牲畜待宰杀。

sentences.english: Culls and pieces are removed at various stages of the processing operation.
sentences.chinese: 宰杀和作品都将被删除处理在行动的各个阶段。

sentences.english: Slaughter, hair removal, dig out the visceral.
Huge sacrifices have been made by small farmers in culling their poultry flocks.
sentences.chinese: 小型农场主宰杀他们的鸡群，作出了极大的牺牲。

sentences.english: Several large beeves were slaughtered, and we can testify as to the excellent quality of the meat.
sentences.chinese: 集市上有几大块宰杀好的牛肉，我们看得出肉质极好。

sentences.english: How can an old hen keep her away from the killings of the own?
sentences.chinese: 一只老母鸡，怎样才能保住性命而不被主人宰杀呢？

sentences.english: She died before she could be killed at the slaughterhouse.
sentences.chinese: 在被送到屠宰场宰杀前，这匹马死了。

definition: to skin/to flay/to excoriate/to peel/to bark at sb/to physically punish sb
same as 剝皮|剥皮[bao1 pi2]
